name: BlokHost
intro: Decentralised website hosting for a decentralised world
introduce: BlokHost simplifies decentralised content delivery, website & file hosting through its web2 user-friendly interface, offering fast, affordable and secure options. Decentralised Nodes provide hosting services to the BlokHost network in return for reward incentives. Running a node that hosts content on the network (host-to-earn) is made easy through BlokHost software that can run on any device.
